devdoc.details: Handle allowances for NFTs administration :     - minting     - burning     - access to admin web interfacesADMINS STORAGE rights are integer(int16) defined as follow :      1 : address can only mint tokens       2 : address can mint AND burn tokens

adminRightsOf(address).details: know if an address has admin rights and its type of rights

params._admin: the address to find admin rights of

returns._0: int16 the admin right for _admin :      1 : address can only mint tokens       2 : address can mint AND burn tokens
bool : truthy if msg.sender has admin rights to mint new tokens
bool : truthy if msg.sender has admin rights to mint new tokens and burn existing tokens

grantMinterBurnerRights(address).details: owner can grant admin access to allow any address to mint new tokens and to burn existing tokensRestricted to CONTRACT OWNER ONLY

params._admin: : address to grant admin minter and burner rights to

grantMinterRights(address).details: owner can grant admin access to allow any address to mint new tokensRestricted to CONTRACT OWNER ONLY

params._admin: : address to grant admin minter rights to

isMinter(address).details: verifiy if an address can mint new tokens

params._admin: : the address to verify minting rights of

returns._0: a boolean, truthy when _admin has rights to mint new tokens

isMinterBurner(address).details: verifiy if an address has rights to mint and burn new tokens

params._admin: : the address to verify minter-burner rights of

returns._0: a boolean, truthy when _admin has rights to mint and burn new tokens

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

revokeAdminRights(address).details: owner can revoke admin right of any admin addressRestricted to CONTRACT OWNER ONLY

params._admin: : address to revoke admin access to

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Administrable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
